translation.it: - Sì. - Questa è la città vecchia.

translation.en: Uh, in case you need a taxi while you're here.
translation.it: Nel caso ti servisse un taxi mentre sei qui.

translation.en: Uh, it's been taken care of.
Oh, well, at least let me tip you then.
translation.it: Almeno lascia che ti dia la mancia.

translation.en: Aw, it's so good to see you.
I can't believe we're finally here. We're doing this.
translation.it: Finalmente ci siamo. Lo stiamo facendo.

translation.en: I know. Come on. I've been waiting to open the duty-free.
translation.it: Lo so. Forza, aspettavo di aprire il duty-free.

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, you waited. That's a first.
translation.it: Hai aspettato. È la prima volta.

translation.en: Thanks for paying for the taxi.
translation.it: Grazie per aver pagato il taxi.

translation.en: Thank Jay. It's all on him.
Can we move in? Stay forever?
Never going home. Think Rob would notice?
translation.it: Non torno più a casa. Rob se ne accorgerebbe?
Spero tu abbia portato il costume.

translation.en: -I think I forgot. -Well, you'll just have to go naked.
translation.it: - Credo di averlo dimenticato. - Vai nuda.

translation.en: -You didn't have to get me anything. -I wanted to, though.
I just wanted to say thank you for planning this whole thing.
translation.it: Volevo ringraziarti per aver organizzato tutto.

translation.en: And I've… I've really missed you so much.
[Beth] Here. I know you love black onyx.
translation.it: Tieni. So che ami l'onice nero.

translation.en: I don't know what to wear. Nothing fancy enough.
translation.it: Non so cosa mettere. Niente è abbastanza elegante.

translation.en: [Rob] So just go in your granny panties. You'll still look great.
translation.it: Metti le mutande della nonna. Sei sempre bellissima.

translation.en: I'm so tired. I just want to go to bed.
So go to bed. It's your holiday too.
translation.it: Allora dormi. È anche la tua vacanza.

translation.en: No, no. Kate booked a restaurant. It'll be fun.
translation.it: No. Kate ha prenotato al ristorante. Sarà divertente.

translation.en: She misses your boobs, she says.
translation.it: Le mancano le tue tette, dice.

translation.en: [laughs] What do you think? New dress.
I went on the post-breakup shopping spree to end all shopping sprees.
translation.it: Ho fatto shopping sfrenato dopo la rottura.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Rob. How's it going?
Oh, is that my gorgeous goddaughter?
-Give her a kiss from me. -[Rob] I will.
translation.it: - Dalle un bacio da parte mia. - Ok.

translation.en: I've got to put her down actually. You guys have a good night.

translation.it: - Lo faremo. - Lo faremo di sicuro.

translation.en: -I'll call you tomorrow. Bye. -Have a good time. Love you.
translation.it: - Ti chiamo domani. - Divertiti. Ti amo.

translation.en: Ah, if I break my neck in these things, it's your fault.
translation.it: Se mi rompo il collo con queste, è colpa tua.

translation.en: You look like a supermodel. You should keep them.
translation.it: Sembri una top model. Dovresti tenerle.

translation.en: -Have you settled in okay? -Yeah. Hi, I'm Beth.
translation.it: - Ti sei sistemata bene? - Sì. Ciao, sono Beth.

translation.en: -It's nice to meet you. -[car horn honks] Everything's great.
[Kate] Do you know what you want? [Beth] I don't know, but I need to eat soon.
translation.it: - Sai cosa vuoi? - Non lo so, ma devo mangiare subito.

translation.en: I keep telling you it's on Jay.
He still hasn't taken me off his credit card.
translation.it: Non mi ha tolto la carta.

translation.en: I intend on discovering what the limit is before he notices.
translation.it: Voglio scoprire il limite prima che se ne accorga.

translation.en: With any luck, he'll have an aneurysm and drop dead on top of his assistant.
translation.it: Con un po' di fortuna, avrà un aneurisma e cadrà morto sul suo assistente.

translation.en: Uh, we'll start with a dozen raw oysters and a bottle of champagne.
translation.it: Iniziamo con una dozzina di ostriche crude e una bottiglia di champagne.

translation.en: -The most expensive one on the menu. -[chuckles] Excellent.
translation.it: - Il più costoso del menù. - Eccellente.

translation.en: I should've been there for you.
You had a baby. You're forgiven.
translation.it: Hai avuto una bambina. Sei perdonata.

translation.en: I'm fine. Couldn't care less about Jay.
translation.it: Sto bene. Non me ne frega niente di Jay.

translation.en: -And what about polyamory, girl? Ooh! -Polyamory, huh?
translation.it: - Io sono per il poliamore ora. - Poliamore?

translation.en: -[cork pops] -I can barely manage one relationship.
translation.it: Io fatico a gestire una relazione.

translation.en: Anyway, enough about me. How about you?
translation.it: Comunque, basta parlare di me. E tu?

translation.en: Mmm, and what about with you?
Are you getting any at least?
Isn't it about time you got back on the horse?
translation.it: Non è ora di tornare a cavallo?

translation.en: I… I just don't feel like it.
-Is he not doing it for you anymore? -[Beth] It's not Rob.
translation.it: - Non fa più per te? - Non è Rob.

translation.en: If you're not happy, take it from me, divorce is the answer.
translation.it: Se non sei felice, credimi, la risposta è il divorzio.

translation.en: Especially when it comes with a big fat alimony paycheck.
Shut up. Go away. Go away.
I'm afraid the card was rejected.
translation.it: Temo che la carta sia stata rifiutata.

translation.en: -Jay. -Did he find out about the card?
Yeah. Turns out I did discover the limit.
translation.it: Sì. Alla fine ho scoperto il limite.

translation.en: Do you want me to go halves?
-You get the drinks at the next place. -[Beth] Kate, I'm so sorry. I'm tired.
translation.it: - Paghi da bere nel prossimo posto. - Mi dispiace. Sono stanca.

translation.en: -And my boobs are like gonna explode. -[Kate] No, no, no.
translation.it: - E mi esplodono le tette. - No.

translation.en: I have to pump. They're full, and I can't.
translation.it: Devo tirare il latte. Non ce la faccio.

translation.en: -And we have the bike tour tomorrow. -Oh, yeah, the bike tour.
translation.it: - Domani c'è il tour in bici. - Sì, il tour in bici.

translation.en: It took me months to convince you to come away.
translation.it: Mi ci sono voluti mesi per convincerti a venire.

translation.en: Who knows when we're going to do it again.
The entrance is just around there.
Oh, wait, wait, wait. I just want to fix my face and powder my nose.
translation.it: Aspetta, mi sistemo e mi inciprio il naso.

translation.en: California originally, but I've lived in London the last 15 years.
translation.it: Dalla California, ma ho vissuto a Londra negli ultimi 15 anni.

translation.en: You left Syria because of the war.
translation.it: Hai lasciato la Siria per via della guerra.

translation.en: No, not, not very well. Um, just a little bit.
translation.it: No, non molto bene, solo un po'.

translation.en: I work with the Global Rescue Initiative, or I used to.
translation.it: Lavoro con la Global Rescue Initiative. Ci lavoravo.

translation.en: -No, no, you get the next round. -[bartender] What can I get you?
translation.it: - No, tu il prossimo giro. - Cosa vi do?

translation.en: Oh my God, look over there. Hot.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio, guarda laggiù. Sexy.

translation.en: -[bartender] Here you go. -We should go over there.
-Mind if we join you? -No, I'm sure they're waiting for someone.
translation.it: - Possiamo unirci? - No, staranno aspettando qualcuno.

translation.en: No, no, please, be our guests.
translation.it: No, vi prego, siate nostre ospiti.

translation.en: I don't think I've seen you here before.
translation.it: Non credo di averti mai vista qui.

translation.en: [man 2] I love your dress. You look like a disco ball.
translation.it: Adoro il tuo vestito. Sembri una palla da discoteca.

translation.en: You want to see pictures of my baby?
translation.it: Vuoi vedere le foto di mia figlia?

translation.en: When was the last time you got hit on by someone that hot?
translation.it: Quand'è l'ultima volta che ci ha provato uno così sexy?

translation.en: Come on, we were just saying you need to get back on the horse.
translation.it: Forza! Dicevamo che devi tornare a cavallo.

translation.en: [Kate] So? Rob doesn't have to find out.
One night of excitement might bring you out of your rut.
translation.it: Una notte di emozioni potrebbe farti uscire dalla routine.

translation.en: We were just saying how you should come back to ours.
translation.it: Stavamo dicendo che dovreste venire da noi.

translation.en: [on voicemail] Hi, you've got Kate, or maybe you haven't, so leave a message.
translation.it: Ciao, hai chiamato Kate, o forse no, quindi lascia un messaggio.

translation.en: [Beth] Hey, did you get my text?
It's already noon, and Kate hasn't come home. Okay.
translation.it: - È mezzogiorno e Kate non è tornata. - Ok.

translation.en: So she's probably gone for a coffee or a wander or something.
translation.it: Sarà andata a prendere un caffè o a fare una passeggiata.

translation.en: I did. I drank a bit much.
Honestly, I can barely remember anything.
Right. And what are you doing today?
We're meant to be doing a bike tour.
translation.it: Dovevamo fare un tour in bici.

translation.en: There you go. That's why she's vanished. Should've told her it was a shopping tour.
translation.it: Ecco perché è sparita. Dovevi dirle che facevate shopping.

translation.en: She… She didn't leave a note, and she hasn't texted either.
translation.it: Non ha lasciato un biglietto e non mi ha scritto.

translation.en: -I'll let you know if I hear. Love you. -[Rob] Bye.
translation.it: - Ti faccio sapere se la sento. Ti amo. - Ciao.

translation.en: I'm sorry to bother you. Uh…
I'm looking for her. Um, Kate.
I think she went out, and I can't get a hold of her.
translation.it: Credo sia uscita e non riesco a contattarla.

translation.en: You haven't seen her, have you?
You're not allowed to have parties. It says so very clearly in the rules.
translation.it: Non potete fare feste. Lo dice chiaramente il regolamento.

translation.en: And I have to charge you for the two extra guests that stayed over.
translation.it: E devo farvi pagare per i due ospiti in più.

translation.en: [officer] What was the name of the bar?
[officer] Okay, let me see her photo.
translation.it: Ok, mi faccia vedere la foto.

translation.en: So you brought two men back to your apartment.
translation.it: Ha portato due uomini a casa sua

translation.en: -And you don't remember their names. -[Beth] Well…
translation.it: - e non ricorda i loro nomi. - Beh…

translation.en: -Had you been drinking? -[chuckles] Yeah, a little.
More than a little if you don't remember anything.
translation.it: Più di un po', se non ricorda niente.

translation.en: I'm… I'm just not used to drinking, that's all.
translation.it: Non sono abituata a bere, tutto qui.

translation.en: I… I just had a baby. So…
translation.it: Ho appena avuto un bambino. Quindi…

translation.en: Okay, your friend probably go out clubbing or to a bar.
translation.it: Ok, la sua amica probabilmente è andata in discoteca o in un bar.

translation.en: So we're supposed to be doing things, sightseeing and…
translation.it: Dovremmo fare delle cose, fare un giro turistico e…
Credo di aver trovato del sangue.

translation.en: Did you check the hospitals? Maybe she had an accident.
translation.it: Ha controllato gli ospedali? Forse ha avuto un incidente.

translation.en: Yeah. I did, but there's no record of her being admitted.
translation.it: Sì, ma non risulta che sia stata ricoverata.

translation.en: [scoffs] Her friend ditched her for some guy, and she's upset.
translation.it: La sua amica l'ha abbandonata per un uomo ed è sconvolta.

translation.en: [in English] Does she have her bag with her? Her wallet, her passport, keys?
translation.it: Ha la borsa con sé? Portafogli, passaporto, chiavi?

translation.en: [in English] Can I file a missing persons report?
No, you can't because you need to wait 24 hours.
Most people show up before then.
I'm sure your friend will too.
translation.it: Di sicuro lo farà anche lei.

translation.en: -Thanks for picking me up. -It was close by. It's no bother.
translation.it: - Grazie per essermi venuto a prendere. - Era vicino. Nessun problema.

translation.en: [sighs] I couldn't remember the name of the bar last night.
translation.it: Non ricordavo il nome del bar ieri sera.

translation.en: -You want me to come in with you? -No.
translation.it: - Vuoi che entri con te? - No.

translation.en: We were sitting right there with two guys.
translation.it: Eravamo sedute lì con due ragazzi.

translation.en: She was wearing a blue dress.
Figured you could use some help.
[scoffs] I didn't know that was an actual, real thing?
translation.it: Non pensavo fosse una cosa reale.
Allora l'avrà fatto la tua amica.

translation.en: No, she didn't hire them either.
might bring you out of your rut.
She kept going on and on about how I needed to have some fun.
translation.it: Continuava a dire che avevo bisogno di divertirmi.

translation.en: I wondered why he was into me.
The barman says he's seen them there a lot.
translation.it: Il barista dice che li vede spesso.

translation.en: [sighs] Does he know how to get a hold of them?
Uh, he only knew their first names.
Come on. I'll take you back.
[Rob on phone] You went to the police?
I mean, this is Kate we're talking about. She's not exactly reliable.
translation.it: Stiamo parlando di Kate. Non è proprio affidabile.

translation.en: [Beth] No, no, she wouldn't do this to me. Leave without telling me?
translation.it: No, non mi farebbe questo. Andare via senza dirmelo?

translation.en: How many times on a night out did she ditch you for a bloke she just met?
translation.it: Quante volte ti ha mollata per uno appena conosciuto?

translation.en: [Beth] No, I've left her dozens of messages.
translation.it: No, le ho lasciato dozzine di messaggi.
- È successo qualcosa. - Non essere sciocca.

translation.en: I've got some brilliant pictures to show you of Aster by the way.
translation.it: Ehi, ho delle belle foto di Aster da mostrarti.

translation.en: Earlier on, we were watching The Godfather, and it turns out
translation.it: Prima stavamo guardando Il Padrino e a quanto pare

translation.en: she really likes the part where they find the horse's head in the bed.
translation.it: le piace la parte in cui trovano la testa di cavallo nel letto.

translation.en: Well, we're seeing you tomorrow. Do you need me to pick you up from the airport?
translation.it: Ci vediamo domani. Ti vengo a prendere dall'aeroporto?

translation.en: I can't believe it's nearly Sunday already.
-I'll have to change my flight. -You can't.
translation.it: - Devo cambiare il volo. - Non puoi.

translation.en: -What about Aster? -You don't think I want to come home, Rob?
translation.it: - E Aster? - Credi che non voglia tornare a casa?

translation.en: Yeah. God, of course. Yeah, sorry.
-Do… Do you need me to come over? -No, It's okay.
translation.it: Vuoi che venga lì? No, va bene così.

translation.en: All right. Just call if you need me, yeah?
[Zain] I called and said I wanted to hire them for a private party.
translation.it: Ho chiamato dicendo che volevo assumerli per una festa privata.

translation.en: What if they don't know anything, or what if they won't tell us?
translation.it: E se non sapessero niente o se non ce lo dicessero?

translation.en: -Maybe we should go to the police. -No, I'll handle it. Don't worry.
translation.it: - Forse dovremmo andare alla polizia. - No, ci penso io. Non preoccuparti.

translation.en: I was on a semester abroad.
I met my husband Rob through her.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto mio marito Rob tramite lei.

translation.en: We hit it off straight away.
You know, right away, she's an extrovert.

translation.it: Mia moglie la chiama Carneebeh. - Carneebeh. - Sì.

translation.en: -Yeah. -What is that? Carneebeh. It's… She likes to play games. [giggles]
translation.it: - Cos'è? - Carneebeh è… Le piace fare giochetti.

translation.en: How did you meet your wife?
She was a doctor at the hospital where I was doing my nursing training?
translation.it: Era una dottoressa dell'ospedale dove facevo il tirocinio come infermiere.

translation.en: She believed me when I say I was a nice guy
translation.it: Mi ha creduto quando ho detto che ero un bravo ragazzo

translation.en: and agreed to go out with me. [chuckles]
translation.it: e ha accettato di uscire con me.

translation.en: Is Mina okay with you helping me?
translation.it: A Mina sta bene se mi aiuti?

translation.en: -The woman you were with Friday night. -Kate! What have you done with her?
translation.it: - La donna che era con te venerdì sera. - Kate! Che le hai fatto?

translation.en: -I have done nothing. -So why did you run just now?
-She hired us for a good time. That's all. -[Zain] Don't lie to me!
translation.it: - Ci ha assunti per divertirci. Tutto qui. - Non mentirmi!

translation.en: -What's he saying? -[Zain] They took her handbag?
translation.it: - Che sta dicendo? - Le hanno preso la borsa.

translation.en: When was the last time you saw her?
[Zain] 3:00 a.m. What'd you do with the bag? Answer!
translation.it: Alle tre del mattino. E la borsa? Rispondi!

translation.en: Did you put something in my water at the bar?
translation.it: - Hai drogato la mia acqua? - Rispondi!
- Hai drogato la mia acqua? - Rispondi! No!

translation.en: I don't need to drug women. Come on. Please let me go. Okay?
translation.it: Non ho bisogno di drogare le donne. Ti prego, lasciami andare. Ok?
Non ditelo alla polizia, vi prego.

translation.en: Please, I'll get you the bag. Okay? Please.
translation.it: Vi prego, vi rendo la borsa. Ok?

translation.en: [in Croatian] I didn't know they were stolen!
-[Zain] You think you were drugged? -[Beth] I've never been that drunk before?
translation.it: Pensi che ti abbiano drogata? Non sono mai stata così ubriaca.

translation.en: They got me a glass of water. They could've slipped something into it.
translation.it: Mi hanno portato dell'acqua. Possono averci messo qualcosa.

translation.en: What if they drugged Kate too, you know? So they could rob us.
translation.it: E se hanno drogato anche Kate per derubarci?

translation.en: Why didn't they take your bag too?
translation.it: Perché non hanno preso anche la tua borsa?
Forse è stata Kate a drogarti.

translation.en: Well, she did hire them to have sex with you.
translation.it: Li ha assunti per fare sesso con te.

translation.en: [Beth] No, no. She would never hurt me.
translation.it: No. Non mi farebbe mai del male.
So che ne sanno di più.
Magari non fare il mio nome.

translation.en: I don't want to get in trouble.
If they revoke my visa, I have no place else to go.
translation.it: Se mi rievocassero il visto, non saprei dove andare.

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry for dragging you into all this.
You're not dragging me into anything.
translation.it: Non mi hai coinvolto in nulla.

translation.en: Call me if you need me, okay?
And look, now I have proof. Something must have happened to her.
translation.it: Ora ho le prove. Le sarà successo qualcosa.

translation.en: Let's not jump to conclusions. Let's start with details.
translation.it: Non saltiamo a conclusioni. Prima i dettagli.

translation.en: -Your friend's name, date of birth-- -No, I gave this to him already yesterday.
translation.it: - Il suo nome, la data di nascita… - No, li ho già detti a lui ieri.

translation.en: -You didn't file it? -He told me to come back in 24 hours.
translation.it: - Non l'hai stilato? - Mi ha detto di tornare 24 ore dopo.

translation.en: I figured her friend was out partying.
translation.it: Pensavo che la sua amica fosse a fare festa.

translation.en: [scoffing] They brought two escorts back to their apartment.
translation.it: Si sono portate a casa due escort.

translation.en: They were drunk. Probably high on drugs.
No, I… I wasn't doing drugs. And… I didn't know they were escorts.
translation.it: No, non ero drogata. E… non sapevo che fossero escort.

translation.en: Something bad has happened to her.
translation.it: Le è successo qualcosa di brutto.

translation.en: [Kate] I don't think they're serial killers, Beth.
translation.it: Non credo siano serial killer, Beth.

translation.en: And even if they are, I don't know if I care. Look at them.
translation.it: E se lo sono, non so se m'importa. Guardali.

translation.en: You need to interview these men.
they might have drugged me or maybe both of us.
translation.it: possano avermi drogata, o forse entrambe.

translation.en: You just said you didn't do drugs.
translation.it: Ha appena detto che non era drogata.

translation.en: I… I didn't do drugs. I was drugged.
translation.it: Non mi sono drogata. Sono stata drogata.

translation.en: -There's a difference. -Funny you didn't mention it before.
translation.it: - È diverso. - Perché non l'ha detto?

translation.en: 'Cause I wasn't sure. I'm still not.
translation.it: Perché non ero sicura. E nemmeno ora.

translation.en: [in Croatian] Can you get her some water?
Then run these names through the system.
translation.it: Poi cerca questi nomi nel sistema.

translation.en: [in English] I'm sorry about my colleague.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per il mio collega.

translation.en: is it possible you may have been assaulted?
Well, when we're done here, we'll take you to the hospital
translation.it: Quando avremo finito qui, la porteremo in ospedale

translation.en: for a drug test and a checkup.
translation.it: per un test antidroga e un controllo.

translation.en: And they admitted they stole it,
translation.it: E hanno ammesso di averla rubata

translation.en: and then gave it back to you.
I explained Kate was missing, and I…
translation.it: Ho spiegato che Kate era scomparsa

translation.en: told them I wouldn't go to the police if they gave it back to me.
translation.it: e che non sarei andata dalla polizia se me l'avessero restituita.

translation.en: [nurse] Any signs of sexual assault are still inconclusive.
translation.it: Qualsiasi segno di violenza sessuale è ancora inconcludente.

translation.en: We'll have those results and the results of the blood test within 24 hours.
translation.it: Avremo sia quelli che i risultati ematici entro 24 ore.

translation.en: -[Jay] It's a classic Kate move. -Going missing?
translation.it: - È una classica mossa di Kate. - Sparire?

translation.en: Always has to be the center of attention.
She wore red on our wedding day, I mean,
translation.it: Al matrimonio era vestita di rosso.

translation.en: should've taken that as a warning of sharks in the water.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto prenderlo come un avvertimento.

translation.en: You haven't talked to her then?
[Jay] No, not for weeks. It's been bliss.
translation.it: No, per settimane. È stata una gioia.

translation.en: -No, no, you talked to her Friday night. -No, I didn't.
translation.it: - No, le hai parlato venerdì sera. - No.

translation.en: She said you called her about the credit card.
translation.it: Ha detto che l'hai chiamata per la carta.

translation.en: What credit card? All communication has to go through our lawyers.
translation.it: Quale carta? Comunichiamo solo tramite avvocati.

translation.en: Look, Beth, I can actually guarantee this whole disappearance act
translation.it: Senti, Beth, ti garantisco che questa sparizione

translation.en: is a lot of bollocks, all right.
What credit card by the way?
What? Are you saying she's… [scoffs] faking her disappearance?
translation.it: Cosa? Stai dicendo che ha finto di sparire?

translation.en: Why? Why would she do that?
Because drama is embedded in her DNA like an extra chromosome.
translation.it: Perché il dramma ce l'ha nel DNA come un cromosoma in più.

translation.en: She once ran off to New York for a week after we had an argument
translation.it: Una volta è scappata a New York per una settimana dopo un litigio

translation.en: with no word if she was dead or alive.
translation.it: senza far sapere se fosse viva o morta.

translation.en: All right, just trust me, she likes to punish people.
translation.it: Ok? Fidati, le piace punire le persone.

translation.en: Look, I gotta go. Just call me, and let me know what happens, all right?
translation.it: Devo andare. Chiamami e fammi sapere cosa succede, ok?
- Che fai? - Il check-out è alle 11:00.
- La tua amica è ancora dispersa? - Sì.

translation.en: -Did you go to the police? -[Beth] Yeah, they're looking for her.
translation.it: - Sei andata alla polizia? - Sì, la stanno cercando.

translation.en: I'm staying till they find her.
If your friend shows up, at least you will be close by.
translation.it: Se la tua amica si presenta, sarai qui.

translation.en: Uh, there should be towels in the bathroom, and…
translation.it: Dovrebbero esserci degli asciugamani in bagno

translation.en: just let me know if you need anything else.
translation.it: e fammi sapere se ti serve altro.

translation.en: I think you're gonna love it.
[on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the--
translation.it: Avete chiamato Rob, lasciate un messaggio dopo il…
È il tuo studio di registrazione?

translation.en: I was about to order in.
Uh, I… I was about to go out actually.
translation.it: Io stavo per uscire, in realtà.

translation.en: I had to get out of there.
Let's get some food before we start looking.
translation.it: Mangiamo prima di iniziare a cercare.

translation.en: -I know a very good Syrian-- -[Rob] Beth.
Uh, what are you doing here?
I've been calling you all day to let you know I was on my way.
translation.it: Ti ho chiamata tutto il giorno per dirti che sarei venuto.

translation.en: My parents are away. Remember? In the Dordogne. She'll be fine.
translation.it: I miei genitori sono via. Ricordi? In Dordogna. Starà bene.

translation.en: -Sorry, am I interrupting something? -No. This is Zain.
translation.it: Vi ho interrotti? No. Lui è Zain.

translation.en: He's a taxi driver. And he's been helping me look for Kate.
translation.it: È un tassista. Mi sta aiutando a cercare Kate.

translation.en: Let me know if you hear anything.
Who the bloody hell is he? [chuckles]
-I just told you. He's the taxi driver. -Who you were going to dinner with.
translation.it: - Te l'ho detto, il tassista. - Con cui stavi per cenare.

translation.en: Give me a break. He's been helping me.
He… He drove me and Kate to a bar the night that she went missing--
translation.it: Ha portato me e Kate in un bar la sera in cui è sparita…

translation.en: Beth, are you kidding? What if he's involved?
translation.it: Stai scherzando? E se fosse coinvolto?

translation.en: [scoffs] No. You were just about to get into a car with him.
translation.it: - No. - Stavi per salire in auto con lui.

translation.en: I didn't mean to upset you.
Why didn't you tell me? I would've flown straight over.
translation.it: Perché non me l'hai detto? Sarei venuto subito.

translation.en: I couldn't tell you over the phone.
Do the police think they're involved in her going missing?
translation.it: La polizia pensa che siano coinvolti?

translation.en: They don't seem to have a clue. And they're barely lifting a finger to find her.
translation.it: Non ne hanno idea. Non fanno niente per trovarla.

translation.en: [Rob] What if Jay's right, and she's messing with us?
translation.it: E se Jay avesse ragione e ci prendesse in giro?

translation.en: She likes to be the center of attention, yes, but she wouldn't do this to me.
translation.it: Le piace essere al centro dell'attenzione, ma non mi farebbe questo.

translation.en: [man] She's been in the water for some time.
translation.it: È stata in acqua per un po'.

translation.en: It's too soon to say. The autopsy will tell us more.
translation.it: È troppo presto per dirlo. Aspettiamo l'autopsia.

translation.en: But you think it was an accident? [sniffles] That she fell in?
translation.it: Ma pensa che sia stato un incidente? Che sia caduta?

translation.en: Or do you think she was killed?
translation.it: O pensate che sia stata uccisa?

translation.en: We need to wait for the result of the autopsy.
We'll be in touch when we know more.
translation.it: La chiameremo quando ne sapremo di più.

translation.en: I feel bad, you know, for finding her annoying.
translation.it: Mi sento in colpa per averla trovata fastidiosa.

translation.en: I have to get going soon. You sure you don't want to come with me?
translation.it: Devo andare. Sicura di non voler venire?

translation.en: We talked about this. I have to…
stay till after the autopsy and…
-There's the arrangements to figure out. -Yeah. Sorry. Sorry.
translation.it: - c'è la burocrazia da sbrigare. - Sì. Scusa.

translation.en: They can't tell if she was sexually assaulted given the state of the body.
translation.it: Non sanno se è stata violentata, dato lo stato del corpo.

translation.en: And the fact she had sex with multiple partners
translation.it: E siccome ha fatto sesso con più persone

translation.en: on the night she went missing.
translation.it: la notte in cui è scomparsa.

translation.en: Can I have a minute? Please?
translation.it: Posso avere un minuto? Per favore?

translation.en: [on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the tone.
translation.it: Avete chiamato Rob, lasciate un messaggio dopo il…

translation.en: It shows high levels of cocaine and ketamine in Kate's system.
translation.it: Mostra alti livelli di cocaina e ketamina nel corpo di Kate.

translation.en: Did you know she was taking drugs?
You'd already made a judgment about who she was.
I thought it would stop you looking for her, and it did.
translation.it: Pensavo vi avrebbe impedito di cercarla e così è stato.

translation.en: [Kovac] The results of your blood work came back too.
translation.it: C'è anche il suo esame del sangue.

translation.en: They also found traces of ketamine.
See. I… I told you I was drugged.
translation.it: Visto? Ho detto che mi hanno drogata.

translation.en: [Kovac] We interviewed the two men you identified.
translation.it: Abbiamo interrogato i due uomini che ha identificato.

translation.en: They deny giving you any illegal substances.
translation.it: Negano di avervi dato sostanze illegali.

translation.en: And they also have alibis for the time of the murder.
translation.it: Hanno anche un alibi per l'ora dell'omicidio.

translation.en: A taxi driver picked them up outside your apartment.
translation.it: Un tassista li ha prelevati da casa sua.

translation.en: Their roommate can vouch for them too.
translation.it: Anche il loro coinquilino garantisce per loro.

translation.en: She's divorcing him. Isn't that a motive?
translation.it: Stanno divorziando. Non è un movente?

translation.en: [Beth] It's only a two-hour flight from here.
translation.it: Sono solo due ore di volo.

translation.en: We interviewed people from the Blue Parlour,
translation.it: Abbiamo interrogato persone del Blue Parlour

translation.en: and several people saw you and Kate arguing when you left.
translation.it: e vi hanno visto discutere mentre uscivate.

translation.en: You didn't argue with Kate then, hours before she died?
translation.it: Non ha litigato con Kate ore prima che morisse?
Sei a tuo agio con questi sconosciuti.

translation.en: I thought you didn't recall anything about that night.
translation.it: Pensavo non ricordasse niente di quella notte.

translation.en: I… I passed out in the taxi, but I remember some things.
translation.it: No, sono svenuta nel taxi, ma ricordo alcune cose.
La sua storia continua a cambiare.

translation.en: You think I have something to do with Kate's murder?
translation.it: Pensate che c'entri con l'omicidio di Kate?

translation.en: Is there anything else you haven't told us?
translation.it: C'è altro che non ci ha detto?

translation.en: [officer] We need your passport until we can verify your statement.
translation.it: Ci serve il suo passaporto finché non verifichiamo la sua testimonianza.

translation.en: If you remember anything, call me.
[in English] Let's hope your story checks out.
translation.it: Speriamo che la sua storia regga.

translation.en: Look, I was going to, but, uh, you were about to have a baby.
translation.it: Senti, l'avrei fatto, ma stavi per avere una bambina.

translation.en: My husband was having an affair with my best friend,
translation.it: Mio marito aveva una storia con la mia migliore amica

translation.en: and you didn't think I had the right to know.
How long was it going on for?
I guess she was trying to get back at me. Tit for Tat.
translation.it: Forse voleva vendicarsi con me. Pan per focaccia.

translation.en: You know they had a thing at Uni.
Yeah, yeah, a drunken one-night stand at freshman week.
translation.it: Sì, una notte da ubriachi la settimana delle matricole.

translation.en: -What are you saying? -[Jay] I'm not saying anything.
maybe there were some latent feelings on her part.
[Beth] How could I have not seen it?
translation.it: Come ho fatto a non vederlo?

translation.en: We don't see what we don't want to see.
translation.it: Non vediamo ciò che non vogliamo vedere.

translation.en: I've been feeling so guilty for…
translation.it: Mi sento così in colpa per…
Come se non fossi abbastanza grata
per la mia vita, per Aster.

translation.en: to look up and see what was staring me in the face.
translation.it: per alzare la testa e vedere ciò che avevo davanti.

translation.en: What if she did drug me
translation.it: E se mi avesse drogata lei

translation.en: so I would sleep with someone
translation.it: per farmi andare a letto con qualcuno

translation.en: or not know if I had or hadn't?
translation.it: o per non sapere se l'avessi fatto o no,

translation.en: Then she could get Rob to leave me.
translation.it: così poteva convincere Rob a lasciarmi.

translation.en: Do you think he could have killed Kate?
translation.it: Pensi che possa aver ucciso Kate?

translation.en: And I spoke to him over the weekend.
translation.it: Ho parlato con lui nel weekend.

translation.en: You never wondered if it was me?
translation.it: Non ti sei mai chiesta se sono stato io?
Una cosa che ho imparato è:

translation.en: Where I come from, we say Alalbek Daleelek.
translation.it: Da dove vengo io, diciamo Alalbek Daleelek.
Il tuo cuore è la tua guida.

translation.en: She was working in a clinic.
I was late to pick her up.
translation.it: Ho fatto tardi a passarla a prendere.

translation.en: [Rob on phone] You there? Hello? Hi?
Hey, um, I was putting Aster down. Sorry, I got your message. You okay?
translation.it: Stavo mettendo a letto Aster. Ho visto il tuo messaggio. Stai bene?

translation.en: Beth, what are you talking about?
That you were sleeping with her for months.
translation.it: Che ci sei andato a letto per mesi.

translation.en: [chuckling nervously] Uh, what? What you talking about?
Stop treating me like an idiot. I found the text messages on her phone.
translation.it: Smettila di trattarmi come un'idiota. Ho trovato i messaggi sul suo telefono.

translation.en: I don't know what to say. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Non so cosa dire. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: I only did it because we… When was the last time we had sex?
translation.it: L'ho fatto perché… Quando abbiamo fatto sesso l'ultima volta?

translation.en: -You were depressed and I-- -No! You do not get to blame this on me.
translation.it: - Eri depressa e io… - No! Non darai la colpa me.

translation.en: -No, I'm not blam… Look, I'm sorry-- -[Beth] Stop apologizing!
translation.it: - No, non ti sto… Senti, scusami… - Smettila di scusarti.

translation.en: Look, you've just got to come home. We can't do this over the phone.
translation.it: Devi tornare a casa. Non si può parlarne al telefono.
Non posso tornare a casa, Rob,

translation.en: because the police have taken my passport because I'm sure they think I killed Kate.
translation.it: la polizia mi ha preso il passaporto, pensano che abbia ucciso Kate.

translation.en: And if they find out about the affair, they'll have a damn good reason too.
translation.it: E se scoprono il tradimento avranno anche un buon motivo.

translation.en: -I am so sorry. -[Beth] Just shut up.
[sniffling] I just want to see Aster.
Beth Jenner, we're arresting you on suspicion of the murder of Kate Thompson.
translation.it: Beth Jenner, è in arresto come sospettata dell'omicidio di Kate Thomson.

translation.en: [officer] Put your hands behind your back. What?
For how long have you known Mr. Zakaria?
translation.it: Da quanto tempo conosce il sig. Zakaria?

translation.en: How did the two of you meet?
He took me and Kate to the bar on Friday night.
translation.it: Ha portato me e Kate al bar venerdì sera.

translation.en: He's been helping me look for her.
Why didn't you tell us he was with you when you confronted the escorts?
translation.it: Non ci ha detto che era con lei quando avete affrontato gli escort.

translation.en: Or that he physically assaulted one of them?
translation.it: Quando ne ha aggredito uno fisicamente.
Avevano rubato la borsa di Kate.

translation.en: He got them to admit it. He got the bag back.
translation.it: Li ha fatti confessare. Ha riavuto la borsa.

translation.en: Mr. Zakaria is connected to organized crime.
translation.it: Il signor Zakaria è collegato alla criminalità organizzata.

translation.en: He's a member of an Albanian gang
translation.it: È un membro di una gang albanese

translation.en: involved in human trafficking, among other things.
translation.it: coinvolta nel traffico di esseri umani, tra le altre cose.

translation.en: You didn't know this about him?
No. No, of course not. What… What are you saying?
translation.it: No. Ovviamente no. Ma che dite?

translation.en: [in English] And you hired him to do it.
translation.it: E l'ha assunto lei per farlo.
- Cosa? - Anche lui è stato arrestato.

translation.en: This is insane! This is insane!
How do you… You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this!
translation.it: Non potete pensare che io c'entri qualcosa.

translation.en: Please! Why would I want Kate dead?
translation.it: Vi prego! Perché l'avrei voluta morta?

translation.en: Because she was having an affair with your husband.
translation.it: Perché aveva una storia con suo marito.

translation.en: You didn't think we'd find out.
Jay has known about it for months.
We are speaking to him later today.
Just because they haven't charged you doesn't mean they won't.
translation.it: Solo perché non l'hanno accusata non significa che non lo faranno.

translation.en: It is only because they don't have enough evidence yet.
translation.it: Solo che non hanno abbastanza prove.

translation.en: They were hoping they could press you on your connection to Mr. Zacharia,
translation.it: Speravano di farle pressione sul suo legame con Zakaria

translation.en: Call me next time before you say anything to incriminate yourself.
translation.it: La prossima volta mi chiami prima di dire qualcosa che possa incriminarla.

translation.en: Your landlord let me in. I needed to see you.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto entrare il proprietario. Dovevo vederti.

translation.en: They told me you'd been arrested.
translation.it: Hanno detto che eri stato arrestato.

translation.en: I was driving all Friday night until Saturday morning.
translation.it: Ho guidato tutto il venerdì sera fino a sabato mattina.

translation.en: you have links to an Albanian criminal gang.
translation.it: hai legami con una gang criminale albanese.

translation.en: I don't know who to believe.
I saved the life of a boy who'd been hit with shrapnel in the leg.
translation.it: Ho salvato la vita a un ragazzo colpito da una scheggia alla gamba.

translation.en: His father has connections to an Albanian people-smuggling ring.
translation.it: Suo padre ha legami con un giro di trafficanti albanesi.

translation.en: He got me out of Aleppo, crossed the border into Turkey then here.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto uscire da Aleppo, ho passato il confine con la Turchia e poi qui. Mi ha aiutato con il visto.
ho passato il confine con la Turchia e poi qui. Mi ha aiutato con il visto.

translation.en: So you don't work for this person?
translation.it: Quindi non lavori per questa persona?

translation.en: How do I know you're telling me the truth?
translation.it: Come so che stai dicendo la verità?

translation.en: [in Arabic] Your heart is your guide.
translation.it: Il tuo cuore è la tua guida.

translation.en: [Beth] You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this.
translation.it: Non potete pensare che io c'entri qualcosa.

translation.en: Why would I want Kate dead?
Because she was having an affair with your husband.
translation.it: Perché aveva una storia con suo marito.

translation.en: My husband was having an affair with my best friend.
translation.it: Mio marito aveva una storia con la mia migliore amica

translation.en: You didn't think I had the right to know?
Uh, my cell data ran out.
translation.it: Ho finito i dati sul cellulare.

translation.en: Could I get the Wi-Fi password?
translation.it: Posso avere la password del Wi-Fi?

translation.en: [Sebastian] What happened with the police? They let you go.
translation.it: Cos'è successo con la polizia? Ti hanno lasciata andare.

translation.en: [Sebastian] And how much longer do you think you'll be staying here?
translation.it: E quanto ancora credi che resterai?

translation.en: A screening for a movie I supervised the music for.
translation.it: Una proiezione per un film. Supervisiono la parte musicale.

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
-Well, thanks. Are you sure? -[Kate] Yeah, no, for sure. Come on.
translation.it: - Beh, grazie. Sei sicura? - Sì, certo. Andiamo.

translation.en: -[Mateo] Here we go. -[Kate] Watch your step.
Somebody's gonna have a beautiful night of sleep.
translation.it: Qualcuno farà una bella notte di sonno.

translation.en: Let's get you ready for bed. Yeah. Whoa.
-[Beth] No! -No! Stop! It's not what you think!
translation.it: - No! - No! Per favore! Non è come credi.

translation.en: You're taping people in the shower having sex!
translation.it: Riprendi persone sotto la doccia che fanno sesso!

translation.en: And you knew what happened to Kate this whole time. You could have told the police.
translation.it: E sapevi cos'era successo a Kate. Avresti potuto dirlo alla polizia.

translation.en: You told them about my husband's affair, didn't you?
translation.it: Gli hai detto della storia di mio marito, vero?

translation.en: What is that? No. Don't delete them.
[Sebastian] Stop, you don't understand! Stop. I can explain.
translation.it: Ferma, non capisci. Fermati! Posso spiegarti.

translation.en: He… He deleted all the videos.
He's gonna tell the police I attacked him.
translation.it: Dirà alla polizia che l'ho aggredito.

translation.en: Oh my God, this is a nightmare.
We'll find out where Kate went, then we can hopefully find out who brought her home.
translation.it: Scopriremo dov'è andata Kate e forse chi l'ha portata a casa.

translation.en: Then we can go to the police. We will explain. It will be okay.
translation.it: Poi lo spiegheremo alla polizia. Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: I gave him the license number.
translation.it: Ho dato loro il numero di targa.
Ti sei fatta male alla mano?

translation.en: Okay, I'll remember that for next time.
translation.it: Ok, lo ricorderò per la prossima volta.

translation.en: They say you're a suspect in Kate's murder.
translation.it: Dicono che sei sospettata dell'omicidio di Kate.

translation.en: You picked up a woman early Saturday morning around 3:00.
translation.it: Hai prelevato una donna sabato mattina verso le tre.

translation.en: -She's my height, blonde hair. -[Zain] On Jerina Street.
translation.it: - È alta come me, bionda. - Su Jerina Street.

translation.en: We just need to know where you took her. That's all.
translation.it: Dobbiamo solo sapere dove l'hai portata.

translation.en: She made me follow these two men. She said they stole her bag.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto seguire due uomini. Le avevano rubato la borsa.

translation.en: I lost them on a one-way street.
translation.it: Li ho persi in un senso unico.

translation.en: [in English] What's he saying? Where'd you take her?
translation.it: Che sta dicendo? Dove l'hai portata?

translation.en: [Beth] If Kate reported her bag stolen,
translation.it: Se Kate ha denunciato il furto,

translation.en: why wasn't there a record of it when I reported her missing?
translation.it: perché non era registrata quando sono andata io.

translation.en: Pavic didn't file my report either.
translation.it: Pavic non l'ha fatto nemmeno con me.

translation.en: We need to get out of here.
[Kovac] Beth! Don't leave! We just want to talk.
I saw the sticker in the security footage.
translation.it: Ho visto l'adesivo nel video di sicurezza.

translation.en: He must've driven Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.it: Avrà portato Kate a casa dopo che ha denunciato il furto.

translation.en: Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God.
It was him. It was him.
-Make her meet you. -[Beth] Wait. Where are you going?
Believe me it's him. It's the cop who did it.
translation.it: - È stato il poliziotto. - Ma che dici?

translation.en: -[Kovac] What're you talking about? -[Zain] We saw the footage.
translation.it: - È stato il poliziotto. - Ma che dici? - Abbiamo visto il filmato. - Che vuoi dire?
- Abbiamo visto il filmato. - Che vuoi dire?

translation.en: [Beth] You hit on her, didn't you?
translation.it: Ci hai provato con lei, vero?

translation.en: My God, you did! You hit on her, and she rejected you!
translation.it: Mio Dio, è così! Ci hai provato e lei ti ha rifiutato!

translation.en: That's what men call women who won't sleep with them!
translation.it: Gli uomini chiamano così le donne che non ci stanno!
Abbiamo trovato i video della sicurezza.

translation.en: And we recovered some of your landlord's footage.
translation.it: E abbiamo recuperato alcuni filmati del padrone di casa.

translation.en: I'm so sorry I doubted you. You were right.
translation.it: Scusa se ho dubitato di te. Avevi ragione.

translation.en: Pavic drove Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.it: Pavic ha portato a casa Kate dopo la denuncia del furto.

translation.en: We think he did make a pass at her.
translation.it: Pensiamo che ci abbia provato con lei.

translation.en: we can safely assume Pavic hit her over the back of the head,
translation.it: possiamo supporre che Pavic l'abbia colpita alla nuca

translation.en: and then dumped her body in the harbor
translation.it: e poi ha gettato il corpo nel porto

translation.en: he arrested for sex work claimed he assaulted them.
translation.it: che ha arrestato per prostituzione dicono di essere state aggredite.

translation.en: but the women all withdrew their statements.
translation.it: ma le donne hanno ritirato le loro dichiarazioni.

translation.en: IA couldn't fire him, so unfortunately, they moved him over to the tourist division.
translation.it: Gli AI non potevano licenziarlo e l'hanno messo nella Divisione Turismo.

translation.en: I ordered a search warrant on Luka and Mateo's apartment and workplace too.
translation.it: Ho ordinato un mandato di perquisizione anche per l'appartamento di Luka e Mateo.

translation.en: They've been drugging the women who hired them then robbing them.
translation.it: Drogano le donne che li assumono, poi le derubano.

translation.en: but the cocaine in her system counteracted it.
So I'm free to go then.
In case you want to press charges against your landlord.
translation.it: In caso volessi denunciare il tuo padrone di casa.

translation.en: Uh, I just put the kettle on. Do you want to stay for a cuppa?
translation.it: Ho accesso il bollitore. Vuoi restare per del tè?

translation.en: Uh, I packed clothes and Ernie the sheep in the bag.
translation.it: Ho messo in borsa i vestiti e la pecora Ernie.

translation.en: I… I didn't bring diapers. I figured you had those.
translation.it: Non ho portato i pannolini. Ho pensato li avessi.

translation.en: I can pop out and get some. No worries.
translation.it: Esco e li compro. Non preoccuparti.

translation.en: Hey, there's this kids' art thing at the park tomorrow.
translation.it: Ehi, domani c'è questa cosa di arte per bambini al parco.

translation.en: I was thinking of taking Aster if you fancy joining us.
translation.it: Pensavo di portare Aster, se ti va di unirti.

translation.en: Maybe we could have lunch after at Georgio's, the three of us.
translation.it: Potremmo pranzare da Georgio's , noi tre.

translation.en: You know, uh, I think you might have my spare car key.
translation.it: Credo che tu abbia la seconda chiave della mia auto.

translation.en: Yeah, it's probably in the bowl in the hallway
translation.it: Sì, probabilmente è nella ciotola in corridoio,

translation.en: Oh my God, I'm so sorry.
I… I got it online. I can send it back.
translation.it: L'ho preso online. Posso rimandarlo indietro.
Non è stato Pavic, è stato…

translation.en: I can't find Ernie the sheep.
Where did you say it was?
It's… It's in the bag. I'll… I'll get it.
translation.it: È nella borsa. La prendo io.

translation.en: I'm gonna stay for that cup of tea.
translation.it: Rimango per quella tazza di tè.

translation.en: If that's, uh, still up for offer.
Suppose you've got a lot to do before you start work on Monday.
translation.it: Avrai molto da fare lunedì prima del lavoro.

translation.en: Did you get the child-minding sorted?
translation.it: Hai risolto la custodia della bambina?

translation.en: You're looking at me strangely. Do you…
Is this some kind of joke?

translation.it: - Sono solo due ore… - È assurdo!

translation.en: You flew back Saturday morning. Won't be hard to check the flights.
translation.it: Sei tornato sabato mattina. Non è difficile controllare i voli.

translation.en: Beth, come on. You can't be serious.
translation.it: Beth, ma dai. Non dirai sul serio.

translation.en: It's from her necklace, and I found it in your jacket.
translation.it: È della sua collana e l'ho trovata nella tua giacca.

translation.en: I can explain. It was an accident.
translation.it: Posso spiegare. È stato un incidente.

translation.en: -What did you do? -Stop. Wait. Listen to me. Listen to me.
And I was waiting outside the apartment.
I'd been calling and texting. She wasn't picking up. I thought…
translation.it: Chiamavo, scrivevo, ma non rispondeva. Ho pensato…

translation.en: I was terrified she told you.
She kept threatening to. I thought if she had, I could at least talk to you.
translation.it: Mi minacciava. Se l'avesse fatto, avrei potuto parlarti.

translation.en: I was about to leave, but then she showed up.
translation.it: Stavo per andarmene, ma è arrivata.

translation.en: Jesus. What the hell are you doing here?
translation.it: Gesù. Che diavolo ci fai qui?

translation.en: You know this makes you a stalker.
translation.it: Questo fa di te uno stalker.

translation.en: I didn't have a choice. You wouldn't answer your phone.
Let's go. Come on. Come on.
We ended up down by the water, and we talked.
translation.it: Siamo finiti vicino all'acqua e abbiamo parlato.

translation.en: You're gonna ruin her life. You wanna do that? I don't.
translation.it: Le rovinerai la vita. Vuoi farlo? Io no.

translation.en: we're doing this. You and me.
translation.it: Non se lo facciamo. Io e te.

translation.en: How many times? It meant nothing.
How can you say it meant nothing?
Why were we doing it if it meant nothing?
translation.it: Perché lo facevamo se non significava niente?

translation.en: I know. You have feelings for me.
translation.it: Lo so. Tu provi qualcosa per me.

translation.en: She told me… She told me she was in love with me.
translation.it: Mi ha detto che era innamorata di me.

translation.en: She, she, she… She kept begging me.
She was begging me to leave you.
She said you were unhappy. I'd be doing you a favor breaking up with you.
translation.it: Ha detto che eri infelice e ti avrei fatto un favore.

translation.en: I told her, I don't know how many times, that was never gonna happen.
translation.it: Le ho detto mille volte che non sarebbe successo.

translation.en: What happened between us was a mistake.
translation.it: Ciò che è successo tra noi è stato un errore.

translation.en: It was the biggest mistake of my life?
[Kate] It was a rebound fling, and you…
translation.it: È stato un ripiego, e tu

translation.en: [sighs] …were in the right place at the right time.
translation.it: eri nel posto giusto al momento giusto.

translation.en: Actually, from now on, I'm only telling the truth.
translation.it: In realtà, d'ora in poi, dirò solo la verità.

translation.en: -Maybe you should try it too. -[Rob] Please, please, Kate, please.
translation.it: - Dovresti provare anche tu. - Ti prego, Kate, ti prego.

translation.en: -Stop it! Get off me! -No, stop, listen to me!
translation.it: - Basta! Lasciami! - È meglio che mi ascolti!

translation.en: She tripped and fell and banged her head.
translation.it: È inciampata, è caduta e ha sbattuto la testa.

translation.en: I didn't mean to hurt her.
No. No, I… I thought she was dead.
-No, you didn't. -[Rob] That's why I left her.
translation.it: - No. - Per questo l'ho lasciata lì.

translation.en: You're lying. I saw the autopsy report. She drowned.
translation.it: Menti. Ho visto il referto dell'autopsia. È annegata.

translation.en: -She was alive in the water when you left. -I'm telling the truth.
translation.it: - Era viva quando te ne sei andato. - Dico la verità.

translation.en: -You have to listen. -No, I don't have to listen!
I will never listen to you again. I should've listened to Kate.
translation.it: Non ti ascolterò mai più. Avrei dovuto ascoltare Kate.

translation.en: That's what the weekend was about.
She wanted to remind me who I was before I met you.
translation.it: Voleva ricordarmi chi ero prima di conoscerti.

translation.en: -What are you gonna do now, huh? -You killed my best friend.
translation.it: Cosa farai ora? - Hai ucciso la mia migliore amica. - Non lo dirai alla polizia.

translation.en: You're not gonna tell the police, are you?
translation.it: - Hai ucciso la mia migliore amica. - Non lo dirai alla polizia.

translation.en: What would be the point? The case's closed. That cop's dead.
translation.it: Che senso ha? Il caso è chiuso. Quel poliziotto è morto.

translation.en: What good is me going to jail? Beth?
translation.it: A che serve che vada in prigione? Beth?

translation.en: Please, I'm begging you. I'm begging you.
You want her to grow up without a dad?
translation.it: Vuoi che cresca senza un padre?
- Suo padre è un assassino. - No.

translation.en: Come on, you know I'm not.
No. You are not calling the police.
I got it all. The police are on their way. Beth?
translation.it: Ho sentito tutto. La polizia sta arrivando. Beth?

translation.en: [Beth] It's okay. Mama's got you. Mama's got you.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. La mamma ti prende in braccio.

translation.en: ♪ When you came to me every night ♪
